attributes.title: no❤️
attributes.review: I downloaded this app and then two days later my grandma died! Bad luck!!! Don’t download!!

attributes.title: so bad
attributes.review: i am originally a supporter of trump 🙄 but this app is terrible! it has so many issues and after using this app i am not a trump supporter and will now be voting anyone other than trump. goodbye. please rate this app 1 star everyone it’ll help for the trump administration ❤️

attributes.title: wish there was a 0 star option
attributes.review: phone crashes immediately when you open the app. causes glitches.

attributes.title: This app made me blind
attributes.review: This app caused me to lose sight in both of my eyes. This app is a hazard and should be removed from the App Store.

attributes.title: gross😤🙀🤢
attributes.review: the app totally crashed my phone and when i got back in all my other apps were gone but this one. it won’t let me delete it and every time i go into the app i see a weird orange shrimp. disappointed.

attributes.title: This app gives you hemorrhoids!!!
attributes.review: DO NOT GET THIS APP!!!! Will cause huge hemorrhoids almost as big and painful as listening to trump!
